DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to compare effectiveness of two different culture media for cultivation of Borrelia burgdorferi sensu lato from skin specimens obtained from patients with erythema migrans.
DOC.brief_title: Culture Media for Borrelia Burgdorferi Sensu Lato
DOC.criteria: erythema migrans in patients > 18 years pregnancy or lactation taking antibiotic with antiborrelial activity within 10 days erythema migrans localized on face or neck Each patient (235 subjects) provided two skin samples (470 skin samples).
